import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FaPhoneAlt, FaEnvelope, FaMapMarkerAlt } from "react-icons/fa"; import "../styles/Contact.css"; function Contact() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", message: "", }); const [formSubmitted, setFormSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Simulate form submission (replace with actual backend logic) setFormSubmitted(true); setFormData({ name: "", email: "", message: "" }); }; return (
